Composite.name: C001
Composite.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Exponent1
Field.comment: Power to which a unit is raised

Field.name: Multiplier1
Field.comment: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value
